launcher.name: BMS
launcher.description: BMS combines interconnected software applications to manage your breeding data across all phases of the crop improvement cycle

launcher.name: G4R
launcher.description: Breeding for Results - Germplasm Management System

launcher.name: KDCompute
launcher.description: Extensible data analysis and customisable framework

launcher.name: SNP Seek
launcher.description: SNP Seek provides Genotype, Phenotype, and Variety Information for rice (Oryza sativa L.)

launcher.name: Germinate (CPC)
launcher.description: Information on the UK's genebank of landrace and wild potatoes, the Commonwealth Potato Collection.

launcher.name: Flapjack
launcher.description: Flapjack provides advanced graphical genotype visualization and analysis for allele-based data sets

launcher.name: TASSEL
launcher.description: TASSEL is a software package to evaluate traits associations, evolutionary patterns, and linkage disequilibrium
